name: Arcane Battlemaster
text: Since you first took up arms, you have felt a kinship with wizards, because, like them, you’re at your best when your natural talents are honed by careful study. While young wizards were studying the elements and energy of the multiverse, you were studying tactics, especially the strategies that employ magic as a weapon of war. The presence of a powerful mage changes the entire dynamic of a typical battle, and you have worked long and hard to familiarize yourself with exactly how such a weapon can be employed or defended against.

features.elementalAction(11thLevel): When you spend an action point to make an attack that hits, choose acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder
features.transmutingStrike(11thLevel): Whenever you hit an enemy with a melee basic attack or a warlord at-will attack power, choose acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder
features.energizingInspiration(16thLevel): Whenever you use inspiring word, choose acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder

flavorText: In battle, as in alchemy, it’s the combination of elements that matters.
